page.title: 18A Vegetarian Family of four
page.content: It is interesting to find that even in a country area like ours,more and more people are becoming{vegetarians-}that is, not eating meat and fish.We began by eating less and less meat and getting more and more enjoyment from eating-and cooking- vegetarian food. Eventually two of us cut meat out of our diet altogether. We did this for {2 main reasons}. Firstly,we did not like the idea of eating animals,and secondly, we feel lighter and healthier.{Shopping}is no problem because we grow our own vegetables,and local health shops sell everything else we need.{Cooking}is fun,because there are so many different foods, herbs and spices which make delicious meals.A{typical}meal would be: eggless mushroom quiche, home-grown potatoes and salad, bean salad, home-made yogurt and fruit. Delicious! J.Casson
